#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int nextPos(int n,int m,int old,int speed)
{
	int newpoint,cycleLength,prev;
	newpoint=old + speed;
	if (newpoint <=m ) return newpoint;
	else
	{
		cycleLength = n-m+1;
		if (old < m)
		{
			prev=m-old;
			old=m;
			speed-=prev;
		}
		speed%=cycleLength;
		newpoint = old+speed;
		if (newpoint>n) return newpoint-(n+1)+m;
		return newpoint;
	}
}

int main()
{
	int T,n,m,s,p,q,pp,pq,ans,i;
	cin>>T;
	while (T--)
	{
		cin>>n>>m>>s>>p>>q;
		ans=0;
		pp=1;
		pq=1;
		for (i=0;i<s;i++)
		{
			pp=nextPos(n,m,pp,p);
			pq=nextPos(n,m,pq,q);
	//		cout<<pp<<" "<<pq<<endl;
			if (pp==pq) ans++;
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
